name: Free Online Audio Video Metadata Viewer - ATools
description: Free online audio video metadata viewer: Parse container, duration, bitrate, resolution, audio sample rate and other information, supports copying JSON, pure frontend local processing.
seoDescription: Free online audio video metadata viewer that supports uploading audio/video files and parsing media information locally in the browser, including container format, duration, total bitrate, video encoding and resolution, audio encoding and sample rate/channels, etc. Optionally loads ffmpeg.wasm to output logs for assistance. Pure frontend local operation without file uploads, suitable for development debugging and media file inspection.
